summary: When Frank Johnson becomes an eyewitness to a murder, he's pursued around scenic San Francisco by his wife, the police, and the murderer.
cast: Ann Sheridan|Dennis O'Keefe|Robert Keith|John Qualen|Frank Jenks|Ross Elliott|Jane Liddell|Joan Shawlee|J. Farrell MacDonald|Steven Geray|Victor Sen Yung|Reiko Sato|Syd Saylor|Tom Dillon|Frank Baker|Steve Carruthers|Spencer Chan|Mike Donovan|Franklyn Farnum|Milton Kibbee|William J. O'Brien|Tom Quinn|Lee Roberts|Jeffrey Sayre|Sammee Tong|Ray Walker|Eddy Waller
title: La fugitiva
